extendedInfo.description: Ever go out to a restaurant and forgot to bring your reading glasses? Have a need to zoom in or magnify something you are looking at? This app helps by magnifying the camera on your android phone easily. Please feel free to email me any questions, comments, problems or even suggestions!Â¡Attention! Due to the variation of phones, many devices do not support the focus mode the application was intended to use. The latest version will allow you to adjust the focus settings available on your device.

reviews.title: Pretty good!
reviews.comment: Zoom resets when you change orientations, which I would prefer be optional, but the zoom works flawlessly with my Galaxy S. Setting the options helps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s now among my top 5 favorite apps out of hundreds.
reviews.comment: Simply great apps, especially. For those of us  40 and over. It really  needs to have a \"Share\" and a \"Feedback\" feature added.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Reading Glasses App Worthless
reviews.comment: Nice idea, but it doesn\'t work, at least not on DroidX.  Tried all the settings to no avail.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor app
reviews.comment: No focus on HTC sensation. Zoom doesn\'t work. I\'m uninstalling app now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What good is it, if it doesn\'t auto or even manual focus? I\'m uninstalling right now. Developer please test your app before posting in market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NTN
reviews.comment: Works fairly, not well satisfied. Zoom doesn\'t work on my Samsung Galaxy Ace but it focus well. However thanks, other magnify apps didn\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Zoom and focus did not work for mu Nexus S 4g. Great idea! still looking for a magnified app. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: No focus, no zoom, force close [Samsung Galaxy Tab p1000]
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work.  Doesn\'t focus well.   Very blurry can read better without it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good apps, very helpful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I needed my glasses
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t make it work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!!
reviews.comment: I love this app expecially when my eyes are tired.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Focus
reviews.comment: The option for the light is great, but it\'s using camera functions so it should NE able to focus as you move menu etc. to proper distance.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Had best results using auto focus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Would not focus on DROID 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy S rooted
reviews.comment: No working zoom or autofocus
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sux
reviews.comment: What a wastr of timel
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: My father says it\'s not sharp :( It helps though
reviews.author: Luc Jansen

reviews.comment: Works perfect on Samsung Galaxy Captivate. It zooms in as it should. Maybe, an auto-focus feature can be added in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t focus very well. Uninstalled. SYSTEM Gingerbread
reviews.author: A Google User
